title: Glitter Girls - Amy Lu 14-inch Poseable Fashion Doll - Dolls for Girls Age 3 & Up
features: New! Posable dolls! Arms bend at elbows and rotate at shoulders. Legs bend at knees and rotate at hips.
Silky long blonde nylon hair comes in a side ponytail and is fun to brush and style!
Bright brown eyes with long eyelashes.
Wears a polka-dot t-shirt, sparkling blue shorts, colorful tights, blue glitter boots and a matching blue hair bow.
Her clothes have easy-open closures that make them quick and easy to put on and remove.
Includes: (1) 14-inch doll, (1) t-shirt (1) pair of shorts (1) pair of tights (1) pair of shoes (1) bow.
Compatible with most 14-inch dolls and accessories
Recommended dolls for kids age 3 years old and up
Collect them all! Discover all of your favorite glitter Girls dolls, outfits, clothes and accessories (including the equestrian collection with 14-inch horses and stable)!
description: It's time to shine with Glitter Girls by Battat! These unique posable 14-inch dolls have an exciting range of sparkly mix-and-match outfits and beautiful, silky hair that's easy to brush and style. Their 14-inch (36. 8cm) height makes them perfectly portable and an easy size for small hands. Made from durable plastic Glitter Girls dolls are easy to clean and care for, making them a great gift for 3-year-old girls (and up) who love fashion and, of course, glitter! (Contain small parts, so please supervise younger children! ) Available in a range of hair, eye, and skin colors, Glitter Girls encourage children to be themselves, be positive, and “add dazzle to every day! ” all while reducing screen time and developing healthy social skills. Create a sparkling world of friendship and adventure with a range of imaginative accessories, toy horses, and 14-inch doll clothes. Let your kids “stand out and be bright” with the Glitter Girls!
